snippet.title: Ciao Bella: la Bella Romanza Trailer
snippet.description:
Guide Elena Battista through her busy life, trying to balance career, family, and romance. She has 13 weeks to win Elio's heart, whilst also making decisions and solving catastrophes in the lives of her friends and family.

Control Elena's day-to-day schedule in this life management sim. Complete new objectives each level, visit locations on the map, raise stats with different actions, interact with various characters and choose dialogue options.

Available to purchase from:

https://www.bigfishgames.com/games/1146/ciaobella/

https://www.wildtangent.com/games/ciao-bella
